[parsermd](https://github.com/rundel/parsermd) can create RMD syntax trees.

```{r}

issues <- my_issues("milesmcbain/testrpkg")

test_issue <- issues$items[[2]]

rmd <- parsermd::parse_rmd(test_issue$body)

rmd[[2]]

updated_rmd <- lapply(rmd, function(node) {
  if (is(node, "rmd_heading")) {
    node$level <- min(node$level + 1, 6)
  } else {
    node$name
  }
  node
}) 

class(updated_rmd) <- class(rmd)

parsermd::as_document(updated_rmd)


```
